title: Is there no first win of the day on OCE server?
body: I've played a few games on and off to level my OCE account and I have never had a single first win bonus. In fact, I don't even have the quest, and have never completed it according to my "completed missions". My NA account has a resetting mission every day that gives somewhere around 500-600 exp. It's pretty painful to level with only 150 exp per game here.

replies.body: FWotD bonus starts from level 15 onwards IIRC
it was supposed to be a lv 10 start, but who knows how many bugs are in new system.
We got it, it starts level 5 actually
its supposed to start at lv 10, new system just bugged like no tomorrow
